quote: The most important things, the experiences that leave marks on our souls for everyone to see, those marks that reflect our most intense emotions in a glass pane, we will never forget.
quote_letters: THE MOST IMPORTANT THINGS THE EXPERIENCES THAT LEAVE MARKS ON OUR SOULS FOR EVERYONE TO SEE THOSE MARKS THAT REFLECT OUR MOST INTENSE EMOTIONS IN A GLASS PANE WE WILL NEVER FORGET
